name: test_e2e_with_logs[012_SQLI_ADV_087]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ADV_087` |
| **Name** | UPDATE SET Injection |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | advanced |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `UPDATE users SET role='admin'`
- **Encoded**: `UPDATE%20users%20SET%20role%3D%27admin%27`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
